text:
@realDonaldTrump Glad you haven't made this political and that you are working hard on uniting the country.  O wait 
President Donald Trump did not invite House Speaker Nancy Pelosi, or any Democrats, to the signing of the historic $2 trillion coronavirus relief bill #SAD
